contextId.information: This is the fifth month of the Hebrew calendar. It is during the dry season. It is during the last part of July and the first part of August on Western calendars. AT: "in the fifth month of his fourth year (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
contextId.quote: in the fourth year and the fifth month

contextId.information: This is the ninth month of the Hebrew calendar. It is during the last part of November and the first part of December on Western calendars. AT: "in the ninth month of the fifth year." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
contextId.quote: in the fifth year and ninth month

contextId.information: This is the tenth month of the Hebrew calendar. It is during the last part of December and the first part of January on Western calendars. AT: "In the tenth month of the ninth year that Zedekiah was king of Judah" or "After Zedekiah had been king of Judah for eight years and nine months" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]])
contextId.quote: In the ninth year and tenth month of Zedekiah king of Judah

contextId.information: This is the fourth month of the Hebrew calendar. The eleventh day is near the beginning of July on Western calendars. AT: "On the ninth day of the fourth month of the eleventh year that Zedekiah was king" or "On the ninth day of the month, after Zedekiah had been king for ten years and three months" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]])
contextId.quote: In the eleventh year and fourth month of Zedekiah, on the ninth day of the month

contextId.information: This is the seventh month of the Hebrew calendar. It is during the last part of September and the first part of October on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])

This is the tenth month of the Hebrew calendar. The tenth day is near the beginning of January on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
contextId.quote: in the tenth month, and on the tenth day of the month

contextId.information: This is the fourth month of the Hebrew calendar. It is during the dry season. The ninth day is near the beginning of July on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
contextId.quote: In the fourth month, on the ninth day of that year

contextId.information: This is the fifth month of the Hebrew calendar. It is during the dry season. The tenth day is near the beginning of August on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
contextId.quote: in the fifth month, on the tenth day of the month

contextId.information: This is the twelfth and last month of the Hebrew calendar. The twenty-fifth day is near the middle of March on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
contextId.quote: in the twelfth month, on the twenty-fifth day of the month
